articles.title: Cannabis and Heart Health: A Troubling Connection Uncovered - SciTechDaily
articles.description: More frequent use of cannabis was associated with higher odds of adverse cardiovascular outcomes, finds a new study in the Journal of the American Heart Association. Research Highlights: An analysis of survey data for 430,000 adults in the U.S. found that usi…
articles.content: Cannabis use is associated with higher risks of heart attack and stroke, a study of 430,000 adults indicates, stressing the need for awareness of its cardiovascular effects. Credit: SciTechDaily.com… [+8375 chars]
